plot: Drama following the life of the officers and men of the King's Own Fusiliers regiment, during their home lives, training exercises and battles.
plot_en: Drama following the life of the officers and men of the King's Own Fusiliers regiment, during their home lives, training exercises and battles.
plot_es: Drama following the life of the officers and men of the King's Own Fusiliers regiment, during their home lives, training exercises and battles.
title: Soldier Soldier
